statements: UPDATE GMOCropYields SET yield_in_tons = 15.5, GMO_affected = TRUE, crop_name = 'Corn' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE GMOCropYields SET GMO_affected = FALSE, crop_name = 'Wheat', growing_season = 3 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE GMOCropYields SET GMO_affected = TRUE, yield_in_tons = yield_in_tons + 2.5 WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' AND growing_season = 2021
UPDATE GMOCropYields SET crop_name = 'Wheat', yield_in_tons = 5.3, GMO_affected = FALSE WHERE id = 3
UPDATE crops SET yield_kg = 2000, season_year = 2022 WHERE crop_id = 1;
UPDATE gmos SET trait = 'Disease Resistant', experimental_group = 'Group A' WHERE gmo_id = 2;
UPDATE crops SET yield_kg = 5000, season_year = 2022 WHERE crop_id = 1;
UPDATE gmos SET trait = 'Drought Resistant', experimental_group = 'Group A' WHERE gmo_id = 3;
UPDATE crop_data SET yield_per_season = 10.5 WHERE crop_id = 1;
UPDATE gmo_impact SET impact_description = 'High impact on crop growth' WHERE impact_id = 3;
UPDATE crop_data SET crop_name = 'Tomato' WHERE crop_id = 1;
UPDATE gmo_impact SET impact_description = 'High impact on soil fertility' WHERE impact_id = 2;
UPDATE crops SET yield = 500 WHERE crop_name = 'Corn'
UPDATE seasons SET start_date = '2022-03-01' WHERE season_year = 2022
UPDATE crops SET yield = 350.67 WHERE id = 1234
UPDATE gmo_effects SET effect_description = 'Improved resistance to pests and diseases' WHERE crop_id = 5678 AND season_id = 2023
UPDATE crops SET yield_in_tons = 10 WHERE crop_name = 'Corn';
UPDATE gmos SET effectiveness = 0.85, gmo_type = 'Modified' WHERE gmo_name = 'Tomato';
UPDATE crops SET yield_in_tons = 10.5 WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' AND season = 3;
UPDATE gmos SET effectiveness = 0.95, gmo_type = 'Modified' WHERE gmo_name = 'Bt Cotton';
